title: IN PHOTOS: Chiefs CEO Clark Hunt's wife Tavia celebrates as $24,800,000,000 family spends Christmas together
text:

IN PHOTOS: Chiefs CEO Clark Hunt's wife Tavia celebrates as $24,800,000,000 family spends Christmas together Discuss Now Clark Hunt with wife Tavia (Image Source: Imagn) Kansas City Chiefs CEO Clark Hunt's wife, Tavia, celebrated Christmas with her family. The Chiefs had their match against Pittsburgh on Christmas, and the Hunt family enjoyed the festival while watching the game.
Tavia recently shared pictures of her Christmas celebration on her Instagram account, where she has around 121,000 followers. As it was match day, Tavia celebrated Christmas on the ground with her family.
The Hunt family stole the show in red and black outfits while Tavia stunned in all-white. She donned a stunning oversized white jacket along with a winter cap and matching white heels. She posted several pictures on Instagram along with a caption saying:

Tavia also celebrated Christmas Eve with her family, and she posted four pictures of their celebration on Instagram. For the occasion, the Hunt family glammed up in matching blue and black attire.
Tavia wore a body-fit black dress for the eve of the festival. She posted pictures with her husband, Clark, along with other family members.
"Joy to the world, the Lord has come! âœ¨ Celebrating the greatest gift of all this Christmas Eve with love, faith, and family.ðŸŽ„ As you unwrap your gifts, unwrap and open your heart to be filled with hope & His everlasting joy. ðŸŒŸ Wishing you peace and blessing as we reflect on His everlasting light. â¤ï¸ Merry Christmas from our family to yours. ðŸŒŸâ¤ï¸," she wrote on Instagram. Tavia has an active presence on social media, especially on Instagram. She frequently shares pictures and videos on the platform, especially from the Kansas City Chiefs matches.
